mapper.insert: insert into message (msg, uid, sendtime) values (#{msg},10,now());
mapper.select: select message.*,posts.title,user.username from message,user,posts where user.uid=message.whoreplyuid and posts.pid=message.pid and message.uid=#{uid} or user.uid=message.whoreplyuid and posts.pid=message.pid and message.uid=10 order by mid desc limit #{start},10;
select count(*) from message where uid=#{uid} or uid=10;
